fit_test_data.exponential_kernel[source]¶

K_ij = exp(-|X_i - X_j|^2)

Type:compute exponential kernel matrix
fit_test_data.fit_data(input_file)[source]¶

fit data with a linear least-squares model

fit_test_data.fit_data_with_kernel(Y, K, Lambda)[source]¶

fit data with a least-squares model with kernel K, observations Y. If noise of observations is Gaussian, Lambda = 2*var(x).
